title: Science Education Learning Design Sharing and Community-Supported Capacity-Building Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science curriculum knowledge and experience utilizing digital educational resources
context.additional_context: Focuses on case studies and methods for utilizing a community platform where science educators share and reuse learning design templates.

learning_goals: Share and provide feedback on at least three science lesson design cases with peers using a learning design sharing platform.
Apply two or more strategies to adapt learning designs for reuse according to educational contexts.
Complete one science lesson plan integrating digital learning materials and instructional design.

resources: Digital instructional material templates for science education

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
